title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Park Home
body: An Unexpected Inauguration that Changed the Nation  As president, Theodore Roosevelt created protections for ordinary citizens, began regulation of big business, and made the US a major force in international affairs. Yet one of the most important presidencies in America's history nearly didn't happen. See the place where a brief, emotional, and improvised ceremony in Buffalo, NY brought TR into office, and forever altered the nation.              Museum Tour information   Visit the TR Inaugural Site to hear how one of America's best-known and most influential presidents came to be inaugurated in Buffalo, NY.
